high_descs: Turn left and walk forward to the left side of the L-shaped desk
Pick up the CD from the desk
Turn right and walk across the room to the small dresser by the door
Turn on the table lamp on the dresser
anns.task_desc: Examine the CD under the light of the table lamp

high_descs: turn left and go forward to the wall in between the desk and night stand and turn right
pick up the CD on the desk
turn right and go forward to the  night stand and turn right and take a step and turn left
turn on the lamp on the night stand
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the night stand

high_descs: Turn to the left and walk across the room, then turn to the right and face the desk.
Pick up the compact disk on the edge of the yellow desk.
Turn to the right and walk across the room, then face the yellow end table with the lamp on it.
Turn on the lamp that is next to the alarm clock.
anns.task_desc: To look at the CD in the light.
